couponSystem.rest

Class CompanyRest

  • java.lang.Object
    • couponSystem.rest.CompanyRest

  • @CrossOrigin(value="*")
 @RestController
public class CompanyRest
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class CompanyRest. COMPANY FACADE METHODS Rest: 1. Create Coupon - POST 2. Remove Coupon - DELETE 3. Update Coupon - PUT 4. getCouponByID - GET{long id} 5. GetAll Coupons - GET 6. Sort Coupons - GET{String filter}
